SpotLight.cpp

Contains implementation of ISpotLight

Functions
CreateSpotLight
CRefObj<ISpotLight> CreateSpotLight(
Vector3& 
pos,
Vector3& 
dir,
FRGBColor& 
color,
float 
intensity,
float 
innerAngle,
float 
outerAngle,
bool 
castsShadows,
bool 
castsLight
)

Creates a spot light

Parameters
pos
Vector3&

position in world coordinates for the light

clr

color of light

intensity
float

intensity of light

innerAngle
float

inner angle defining where light is full intensity

outerAngle
float

outer angle. Light falls off from full to no intensity between inner and outer angle

dir
Vector3&

direction vector

castsShadows
bool

does this light participate in shadow mapping?

castsLight
bool

does this light illuminate the scene?

Returns

Returns the created point light
